00045 /*
00046 ** Return the error string associated with a particular error code.
00047 ** This will return 0 for an invalid error code.
00048 **
00049 ** The generic function prototype that can be compiled for ANSI or Unicode
00050 ** is defined as follows:
00051 **
00052 ** LPCTSTR APIENTRY gluErrorStringWIN ( GLenum errCode );
00053 */
00054 #ifdef UNICODE
00055 #define gluErrorStringWIN( errCode ) ( ( LPCSTR )  gluErrorUnicodeStringEXT( errCode ) )
00056 #else
00057 #define gluErrorStringWIN( errCode ) ( ( LPCWSTR ) gluErrorString( errCode ) )
00058 #endif
00059 
00060 const GLubyte* APIENTRY gluErrorString ( 
00061     GLenum   errCode );
00062 
00063 const wchar_t* APIENTRY gluErrorUnicodeStringEXT ( 
00064     GLenum   errCode );
00065 
00066 const GLubyte* APIENTRY gluGetString ( 
00067     GLenum   name );

00357 /****           Callback function prototypes    ****/
00358 
00359 /* gluQuadricCallback */
00360 typedef void ( CALLBACK* GLUquadricErrorProc ) ( GLenum );
00361 
00362 /* gluTessCallback */
00363 typedef void ( CALLBACK* GLUtessBeginProc )        ( GLenum );
00364 typedef void ( CALLBACK* GLUtessEdgeFlagProc )     ( GLboolean );
00365 typedef void ( CALLBACK* GLUtessVertexProc )       ( void * );
00366 typedef void ( CALLBACK* GLUtessEndProc )          ( void );
00367 typedef void ( CALLBACK* GLUtessErrorProc )        ( GLenum );
00368 typedef void ( CALLBACK* GLUtessCombineProc )      ( GLdouble[ 3 ],
00369                                                   void*[ 4 ], 
00370                                                   GLfloat[ 4 ],
00371                                                   void** );
00372 typedef void ( CALLBACK* GLUtessBeginDataProc )    ( GLenum, void * );
00373 typedef void ( CALLBACK* GLUtessEdgeFlagDataProc ) ( GLboolean, void * );
00374 typedef void ( CALLBACK* GLUtessVertexDataProc )   ( void *, void * );
00375 typedef void ( CALLBACK* GLUtessEndDataProc )      ( void * );
00376 typedef void ( CALLBACK* GLUtessErrorDataProc )    ( GLenum, void * );
00377 typedef void ( CALLBACK* GLUtessCombineDataProc )  ( GLdouble[ 3 ],
00378                                                   void*[ 4 ], 
00379                                                   GLfloat[ 4 ],
00380                                                   void**,
00381                                                   void* );
